title: 820-3330 boots and hibernates
message:
Arrived with drop damage but still turns on. After the progress bar gets about 1/2 way the system will automatically go into hibernate.

After it’s turned back on from hibernate it will stay on for only a few minutes before going into hibernate again. Also even with the battery disconnected at times it will show 100% in the progress bar and in the power section show about 14,000 cycles??

The glass is cracked on the screen but the LCD is still good. Any ideas on this one?

title: 820-3330 boots and hibernates
message:
Try first new BIOS clean ME, just in case.
You can disable GPU, if you suspect it.
